Back to Ludwig van Beethoven

Ludwig van Beethoven

Sonata no. 20 in G major, op. 49 no. 2

c. 1797–1798 · Biamonti 120

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 9'

  • 1. Allegro, ma non troppo
  • 2. Tempo di Menuetto

Recommended editions

  • Neue Gesamtausgabe (Henle) · VII/3 · HN 4252 · Klaviersonaten / Band 2 · ed. Hans Schmidt
  • Associated Board · The 35 Piano Sonatas / Volume 1 · ed. Barry Cooper
  • Bärenreiter · BA 11842 · Sämtliche Sonaten für Klavier II · ed. Jonathan Del Mar
  • Bärenreiter · BA 10858 · ed. Jonathan Del Mar
  • Henle · HN 834 · Klaviersonaten Band II · ed. Norbert Gertsch / Murray Perahia
  • Henle · HN 835 · Klaviersonaten Band II · ed. Norbert Gertsch / Murray Perahia
  • Henle · HN 1327 · ed. Norbert Gertsch / Murray Perahia
  • Könemann · K 108 · Sonaten II · ed. István Máriássy
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50428 · Klaviersonaten / Band 2 · ed. Peter Hauschild / Jochen Reutter
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50248 · ed. Peter Hauschild

1. Allegro, ma non troppo

Duration: 5'

Difficulty: 2

2. Tempo di Menuetto

Beethoven subsequently used the same theme in the menuet of the Septet in E-flat major (op. 20), which he later arranged for clarinet (or violin), cello and piano (op. 38).

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 2
